ingredients: 8 small Granny Smith apples, or as needed,   +   1/2 cup unsalted butter, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/2 cup packed brown sugar,   +   1/4 cup water, 1 (9 inch) double-crust pie pastry, thawed
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 9g 46%, Cholesterol 31mg 10%, Sodium 124mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 52g 19%, Dietary Fiber 3g 10%, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 23mg 2%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 156mg 3%
